data.title: vortex-p: a Helmholtz-Hodge and Reynolds decomposition algorithm for particle-based simulations
data.name: vortex-p
data.description: Implements a Helmholtz-Hodge decomposition and a Reynolds decomposition for the velocity field of general particle-based simulation outputs

evidence: "# ``vortex-p`` code" and description of a specific algorithm implementation indicate a standalone research code rather than a general-purpose library.
"Implements Helmholtz-Hodge decomposition for particle-based, moving-mesh or meshless simulations" shows it directly performs scientific simulation/analysis tasks central to research results.
README only links to documentation and papers, with no mention of package managers, containers, or binaries, implying distribution via the source repository.
